subclass_features.name: Specialization Feature 1, Choice Level
subclass_features.desc: Starting at 3rd level, you get one or more features relating to your specialization with your Class. Some classes choose their specialization as early as 1st level, but most choose at 3rd.

subclass_features.name: Specialization Feature: Bonus Proficiencies
subclass_features.desc: When you choose this archetype at 3rd level, many archetypes grant one or more proficiencies relating to the chosen specialization.

subclass_features.name: Specialization Feature 2
subclass_features.desc: At 9th level, your chosen specialization grants you another ability. If your archetype choice happens before level 3, you may gain this at a different level.

subclass_features.name: Specialization Feature 3
subclass_features.desc: Starting at 13th level, you gain another ability from your class archetype. This may be earlier or later than 13th level.

subclass_features.name: Specialization Feature 4
subclass_features.desc: Starting at 17th level, your archetype grants you a capstone ability for your chosen specialization. Depending on when you gained your previous specialization features, this capstone may be granted earlier or later than 17th level.
